search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Handwrytten (handwrytten.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Handwrytten can be found at this URL: [https://www.handwrytten.com/pricing/](https://www.handwrytten.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Handwrytten Pricing | Subscription Plans & Bulk Prices

extracted_content.content:
Pricing + Plans
---------------

Handwrytten has pricing options for any budget. All of our cards are available without a contract. Simply sign in and start sending. If you plan on sending many notes, we also offer subscription plans, bulk discounts, and prepay options.

[Browse Our Collection](https://app.handwrytten.com/cards)

Cards start at $3.25. Most are available for  
**$3.75**![Image 1](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/underline1.svg) plus postage.

![Image 2](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/pricing-side-static.svg)

![Image 3](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/pricing-side-arm.svg)

![Image 4](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/robot-hand-blue.svg)

![Image 5](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/stretch-arm.svg)

![Image 6](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/hero-base-bl@2x.png.webp)

![Image 7](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/hero-main-arm1.svg)

![Image 8](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/business/parts/arm-claw.svg)

![Image 9](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/business/parts/arm-claw.svg)

![Image 12](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/hero-bolt.svg)

![Image 13](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/hero-base-bl@2x.png.webp)

![Image 15](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/bag-card3.svg)

![Image 16](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/bag-card2.svg)

![Image 17](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/bag-card2.svg)

![Image 18](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/bag-card1.svg)

![Image 19](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/hero-tag-arm1.svg)

![Image 20](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/parts/hero-tag-arm2.svg)

![Image 21](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/dot.svg)

![Image 22](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/dot.svg)

![Image 23](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/confetti2.svg)

![Image 24](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/confetti2.svg)

Subscription Plans
------------------

For users who continually send several cards a month,  
we have generous discount plans tailored to you.

![Image 25](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-top.svg)

![Image 26](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-side.svg)

![Image 27](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-bot.svg)

### Silver

24 Cards Per Month

10% Discount

$98 per Month

![Image 28](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-top.svg)

![Image 29](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-side.svg)

![Image 30](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-bot.svg)

### Gold

50 Cards Per Month

15% Discount

$195 per Month

![Image 31](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/price-feature-arm1@2x.png)

![Image 32](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/price-feature-arm2@2x.png)

![Image 33](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/price-feature-arm1@2x.png)

![Image 34](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/price-feature-arm2@2x.png)

![Image 35](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-top.svg)

![Image 36](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-side.svg)

![Image 37](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-bot.svg)

### Platinum

100 Cards Per Month

20% Discount

$373 per Month

![Image 38](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-top.svg)

![Image 39](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-side.svg)

![Image 40](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/about/vs-featured-bot.svg)

### More Plans Available

250+ Cards Per Month

25-40% Discount

$885-$14,900 per Month

\*All plans include domestic postage. "Cards Included" based on $3.75 card price. Premium and customized cards and international postage may use more credits, reducing total cards included per month. Discount applies to all orders, even after prepay is exhausted. **Unused credits roll over until subscription is canceled.**

![Image 41](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/pricing-env2@2x.png.webp)

![Image 42](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/pricing-env3@2x.png.webp)

![Image 43](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/pricing/pricing-env1@2x.png.webp)

![Image 56](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/parts/confetti2.svg)

Bulk Pricing
------------

Using our website, it is easy to upload large batches of orders at the same time for our best discounts. Just click the "Bulk Send" button under any card.

![Image 57](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/single-dot.svg)

![Image 58](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/business/card-border1.svg)

![Image 59](https://webcdn.handwrytten.com/wp-content/themes/handwrytten/images/business/form-corner.svg)

Prepay For Great Discounts
--------------------------

Plan on sending thousands of cards or more over time? Need custom fulfillment? Handwrytten has tiered prepay pricing to 100,000 cards or more. Prepay below or contact the sales team for the latest pricing options.

[Prepay for Bulk Discount](https://app.handwrytten.com/prepaid-plans) [Contact Sales Team](https://www.handwrytten.com/pricing/#contact)

This website uses cookies to improve your experience.  
We'll assume you're ok with this, but you can opt-out if you wish.

*   [Accept](https://www.handwrytten.com/pricing/#)
*   [Read More](https://www.handwrytten.com/privacy-policy/)

Handwrytten pricing offers options for those looking to send handwritten cards. Browse single purchases, bulk orders, prepays and subscriptions today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Handwrytten offers pricing for individual cards, subscription plans, bulk discounts, and prepay options. Discounts vary based on volume and subscription tier.
